wlan: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct, hotspot
messaging: SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM
features_c:
- Fast battery charging: 60% in 30 min (Quick Charge 2.0)
  - ANT+ support
  - S-Voice natural language commands and dictation
  - Air gestures
  - Dropbox (50 GB cloud storage)
  - Active noise cancellation with dedicated mic
  - MP4/DivX/XviD/WMV/H.264 player
  - MP3/WAV/eAAC+/AC3/FLAC player
  - Photo/video editor
  - Document editor
colors: Frosted white, Charcoal black, Bronze Gold, Blossom Pink
sensors: Fingerprint, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, gesture, UV, heart rate, SpO2
cpu:
Quad-core 2.7 GHz Krait 450 (Snapdragon 805)
Quad-core 1.3 GHz Cortex-A53 & Quad-core 1.9 GHz Cortex-A57 (Exynos 5433)
os: Android OS, v4.4.4 (KitKat), v5.0.1 (Lollipop), upgradable to v5.1.1 (Lollipop)
primary_: 16 MP, f/2.2, 31mm, OIS, autofocus, LED flash
speed:
HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat4 150/50 Mbps (Exynos 5433)
HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE Cat6 300/50 Mbps (Snapdragon 805)
features: 1/2.6" sensor size, 1.12 Âµm pixel size, geo-tagging, touch focus, face/smile detection, panorama, HDR
performance:
